entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
